mapper.select: SELECT mainsite_info, mainsite_min_capacity, mainsite_max_capacity, mainsite_no, mainsite_parking_size, mainsite_min_price, mainsite_add_price, mainsite_name, mainsite_img1, mainsite_img2, mainsite_img3, mainsite_section, mainsite_size, mainsite_type, mainsite_reg_date FROM MAINSITE WHERE camp_no =#{campNo} AND mainsite_reservation_end > #{startDate} AND delete_flag = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMP_RESERVATION (user_id, camp_no, mainsite_no, reservation_status, reservation_reg_date, reservation_user_name, reservation_start_date, reservation_end_date, use_num, reservation_user_phone, reservation_reg_car_num, reservation_request, total_payment_price, total_reservation_reg_car, payment_type) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{camp.campNo}, #{mainSite.mainSiteNo}, #{reservationStatus}, #{reservationRegDate}, #{reservationUserName}, #{reservationStartDate}, #{reservationEndDate}, #{useNum}, #{reservationUserPhone}, #{reservationRegCarNum:VARCHAR}, #{reservationRequest:VARCHAR}, #{totalPaymentPrice}, #{totalReservationRegCar:NUMERIC}, #{paymentType});
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_status FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE user_id = #{value} AND reservation_status IN (1, 2, 3, 4)

SELECT r.reservation_no, u.camp_name, m.mainsite_type, r.reservation_status, r.reservation_reg_date, r.reservation_start_date, r.reservation_end_date, r.total_payment_price, r.camp_no, r.reservation_user_name, r.reservation_user_phone, r.use_num FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, MAINSITE m, CAMP c, USERS u WHERE r.camp_no = m.camp_no AND m.camp_no = c.camp_no AND c.user_id = u.user_id
AND r.user_id = #{id}
AND r.camp_no = #{campNo}
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND m.mainsite_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.searchKeyword},'%')
r.total_payment_price DESC
r.total_payment_price ASC
r.reservation_status ASC
r.reservation_status DESC
r.reservation_reg_date DESC
r.reservation_reg_date ASC
LIMIT #{search.pageSize} OFFSET #{search.offset}

SELECT DC.DCOUNT, WC.WCOUNT, MC.MCOUNT, YC.YCOUNT, BYDC.BYDCOUNT, BYWC.BYWCOUNT, BYMC.BYMCOUNT, BYYC.BYYCOUNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) DCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY ) AND NOW() ) DC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) WCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK ) AND NOW() ) WC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) MCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH ) AND NOW() ) MC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) YCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 YEAR ) AND NOW() ) YC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYDCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYDC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYWCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYWC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYMCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYMC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYYCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 YEAR) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYYC;
